title: First lawsuit filed against Facebook, Cambridge Analytica
text:
First lawsuit filed against Facebook, Cambridge Analytica   00:56 
A U.S. resident has sued Facebook and a British-based political consultancy for obtaining data from millions of the social media site’s users without their permission. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A U.S. resident has sued Facebook and a British-based political consultancy for obtaining data from millions of the social media site’s users without their permission. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pvW2lx
